root.name: Cosmo Ranger: S.O.L. AD 2000
root.description: SummaryThe player is an astronaut on a space ship. You fight through three decks of the ship against various robots and automatons. Interestingly, this game is played from the third-person side-scrolling perspective, but also periodically from a first-person perspective. When the player hears an alarm, he must teleport to the top of the ship to man the turret against enemy space ships from a first-person perspective.
